text: Expedition of Zayd ibn Harithah to Wadi al-Qura took place in November, 627AD, 7th month of 6AH of the Islamic calendar.Note: Book contains a list of battles of Muhammad in Arabic, English translation available here Wadi al-Qura was an oasis, about 7 miles from Medina. Zayd ibn Harithah set out with 12 men to survey this area and to monitor the movements of enemies of Muhammad. However, the inhabitants in this area were unfriendly to Zayd. The people there attacked the Muslims, killed 9 of them, while the rest including Zaid bin Haritha managed to escape. ==See also== *Military career of Muhammad *List of expeditions of Muhammad ==Notes== Category:627 Category:Campaigns ordered by Muhammad
title: Expedition of Zayd ibn Harithah (Wadi al-Qura)
